venue.name: Jake n JOES Sports Bar and Grille

item.description:
Hi ladies,

Hope everyone is enjoying this summery weather?  I know I am!

So you must be wondering why I am scheduling a "Cinco de Mayo" event at a restaurant that isn't specifically Mexican?  Well.....I called 3 local Mexican eateries to see if there was any way I could make a reservation for Sat the 5th and they pretty much laughed at my request.  (I kind of expected this response but figured I would try anyway:-)

For those that have never been, Jake N JOES has great American cuisine, a HUGE bar, tons of TVs for those of you who are sports fans, and everything is reasonable priced.

I am planning to make a reservation so PLEASE keep your rsvp updated.  This restaurant will be busy the night of May 5th so "no shows" will not be tolerated.  If you RSVP that you are coming and do attend, I will have to remove you from the group.  I hate to have it come down to this but this is the new policy that I will be enforcing.

On a lighter note!!!  I look forward to meeting some new fabulous females!

Lisa

PS. Membership fees are $5 per person annually.  You can pay online or when you attend a Meet Up.  Thanks again!!
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation is under "Lisa"- I will send out final details the day before
item.name: Cinco de Mayo is Drinko de Mayo!Let's get a Margarita at Jake N JOES in Norwood!
